## ðŸ”’ Building Continuum - Chapter 17 â€” The Ache of Being Misunderstood

What began in mid-August 2025 as a contained six-part essay series titled *Bitcoin Chronicles* quietly expanded into hundreds of chaptersâ€”historical, theological, technological, philosophical. As Continuumâ€™s features matured in parallel and the article count climbed toward 700, the broader ecosystem remained focused on spectacle. This chapter explores the ache of building something layered and enduring while appearing out of sync with the moment.

---

> ðŸ”’ **This is a paid article.**

tags: ðŸ”’ Building Continuum - Chapter 17 â€” The Ache of Being Misunderstood

What began in mid-August 2025 as a contained six-part essay series titled *Bitcoin Chronicles* quietly expanded into hundreds of chaptersâ€”historical, theological, technological, philosophical. As Continuumâ€™s features matured in parallel and the article count climbed toward 700, the broader ecosystem remained focused on spectacle. This chapter explores the ache of building something layered and enduring while appearing out of sync with the moment.
